text: Secret Admirer is a 1985 American teen romantic comedy movie directed by first time director David Greenwalt and starring Kelly Preston, C. Thomas Howell, Fred Ward, Lori Loughlin, Dee Wallace Stone, Cliff DeYoung, Leigh Taylor- Young, Casey Siemaszko, Corey Haim. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 romantic comedy movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies
title: Secret Admirer
